shortDescription.shortDescription: This logo may be used if your hardware complies with the Open Source Hardware Definition. The gear logo is CC-SA. The original designer of the open hardware logo is Macklin Chaffee, who won the community contest for the logo design in 2011.

childMarkdownRemark.html: This logo may be used if your hardware complies with the Open Source Hardware Definition. The gear logo is CC-SA. The original designer of the open hardware logo is Macklin Chaffee, who won the community contest for the logo design in 2011.
